title: Study Focus Tracker
description: A microservices-based platform for tracking study sessions, managing focus time, and analyzing productivity patterns. Built with Node.js, NestJS, and PostgreSQL.
longDescription: Study Focus Tracker is a comprehensive productivity platform designed to help students and professionals manage their study sessions effectively. The application features real-time session tracking, detailed analytics, goal setting, and team collaboration features. Built with a microservices architecture using NestJS, it handles thousands of concurrent users with excellent performance.
highlights: Real-time WebSocket connections for live session tracking
Advanced analytics dashboard with D3.js visualizations
JWT-based authentication with refresh token rotation
Docker Compose setup for easy local development

title: Developer Portfolio & Blog
description: This very portfolio site you're viewing! A full-stack application with Angular SSR, NestJS API, custom markdown pipeline, and admin dashboard.
longDescription: A modern developer portfolio built with Angular and NestJS, featuring server-side rendering for optimal SEO, a custom content pipeline that processes markdown at build time, and a secure admin dashboard for content management. The site achieves excellent Core Web Vitals scores and follows accessibility best practices.
highlights: Angular SSR with server-side rendering for SEO
Build-time markdown processing with syntax highlighting
JWT-secured admin dashboard for blog management
Dark/light mode with system preference detection
Contact form with rate limiting and email integration

title: Task Manager CLI
description: A powerful command-line task management tool built with Rust. Features include project organization, priority levels, due dates, and GitHub integration.
longDescription: A fast and intuitive CLI tool for managing tasks and projects from the terminal. Built with Rust for performance and reliability, it integrates with GitHub Issues and supports multiple project workspaces. The tool features a beautiful TUI (Terminal User Interface) built with ratatui.
highlights: Beautiful terminal UI with keyboard navigation
